item.author: hkowm@hko.gov.hk (Hong Kong Observatory)
item.title: Bulletin updated at 12:02 HKT 29/01/2022
item.description:
At noon at the Hong Kong Observatory :
Air temperature : 19 degrees Celsius
Relative Humidity : 77 per cent
During the past hour the mean UV Index recorded at King's Park : 3
Intensity of UV radiation : moderate

A cold front has formed over inland Guangdong and is expected to move across the coastal areas between tonight and tomorrow (30/1) morning. Winds will strengthen from the north and temperatures will fall significantly. Under the influence of the associated winter monsoon, it will be relatively cold and windy with a few rain patches in Hong Kong from tomorrow to the Lunar New Year holidays. Members of the public are reminded to keep warm, and to take care of the elderlies and persons with chronic medical conditions.
The air temperatures at other places were:
Hong Kong Observatory19 degrees ;
King's Park19 degrees ;
Wong Chuk Hang20 degrees ;

0.1 millimetre of rainfall was recorded at the Hong Kong Observatory between midnight last night and midday today.
